title: Is it legal to be discriminative against pregnant women in college?
body:
My friend was telling me that if you take maternity leave in college they can legally kick you out once you miss enough irregardless of whether or not that is considered medical leave or not.

I don't want to believe this is true.

Is it?

Example- I'm a woman. 25. I'm in college. I get pregnant  in my first semester of college. At 7-8 months i have to take off the next 2-3 months of school.

It's legal for them to kick me out irregardless of whether or not that is maternity leave.
